statements: UPDATE real_estate_projects SET project_description = 'Luxury waterfront condos', start_date = '2022-10-15', end_date = '2023-12-31' WHERE project_id = 1;
UPDATE real_estate_projects SET current_funding = 50000.00, goal_amount = 250000.00 WHERE project_name = 'Downtown Tower';
UPDATE real_estate_projects SET current_funding = current_funding + 5000, end_date = '2023-12-31' WHERE project_id = 1001;
UPDATE real_estate_projects SET project_description = 'New Description', goal_amount = 150000.75, start_date = '2022-06-01' WHERE project_id = 1002;
UPDATE Campaigns SET current_funds = 15000.50 WHERE campaign_id = 1;
UPDATE Backers SET email = 'newemail@example.com', contribution = 500.75 WHERE backer_id = 4;
UPDATE Campaigns SET current_funds = current_funds + 5000, funding_goal = funding_goal * 1.1 WHERE campaign_id = 12345;
UPDATE Backers SET contribution = contribution - 1000, backer_name = 'John Doe' WHERE backer_id = 54321;
UPDATE Campaigns SET target_amount = 5000.00 WHERE campaign_id = 1;
UPDATE Backers SET total_contribution = 1000.50 WHERE backer_id = 5;
UPDATE Campaigns SET target_amount = 5000.00, end_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE campaign_id = 1;
UPDATE Backers SET total_contribution = total_contribution + 1000.00, backer_email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE backer_id = 5;
UPDATE Campaigns SET funding_goal = 15000.00, project_description = 'Updated project description' WHERE campaign_id = '7023e94d-c47d-4f88-90d6-7d734bf1d4c3';
UPDATE Investors SET total_investment = 5000.00 WHERE investor_id = 'e47914f3-4e11-42c5-8247-00234476d38f';
UPDATE Campaigns SET project_description = 'New project description' WHERE campaign_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE Investors SET total_investment = total_investment + 1000 WHERE investor_id = '98765432-ABCD-EFGH-IJKL-9876543210AB';
UPDATE projects SET funding_goal = 5000 WHERE project_id = 1;
UPDATE backers SET total_invested = 2000, backer_email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE backer_id = 3;
UPDATE projects SET funding_goal = 50000, funds_raised = 35000 WHERE project_id = 1;
UPDATE investments SET amount_invested = 2000, investment_date = '2023-05-15' WHERE investment_id = 3;
